name: Le Petit Delice
description:
La petite delicien is a stacking game heavily influenced by it's narrative. During the game you play as Isaac, a young psychology student doing his best to stay afloat by working in a restaurant. The game objective is to drop the smallest ammount of plates possibles as they go falling from the top of the screen meanwhile during Isaac's commutes you get to know him more.
